content:
Everyone:
.
As many of you know we have had the ZIB/CBB based profiles for FHIR STU3 in the works on GitHub for a while. Now that Simplifier is STU3 ready, we've done the following things
- Renamed https://simplifier.net/Nictiz to https://simplifier.net/NictizDSTU2
- Created a new project Nictiz as https://simplifier.net/Nictiz
- Activated synching of https://github.com/Nictiz/MedMij-STU3 to https://simplifier.net/Nictiz
.
HL7 NL is making its mind up about the nl-core profiles governance. The outcome of that determines the location of the nl-core STU3 profiles. Pending the decision you can still find everything on GitHub. As soon as I know what direction we're heading (in 1-2 weeks I'm hoping) I'll post here where they land on Simplifier.
We should still give the profiles the right status of maturity @Ardon Toonstra can you take a look at that?
E.g. the Medication resources have been mapped to STU3, but we are still working on creating profiles for that. The ones in Simplifier right now are results of a first automatic conversion
I will give the profiles the right maturity status
Awesome, thanks! If you need help, let me know
It is just the status, we still need to a customize the workflow statussen in that project
will be similiar to the DSTU2 project
I've applied the workflow we had in the previous iteration of the project already, earlier today
